Posts.Content: kalua wrote: next month (feb) will be two years since first diagnosed with hrneg metastatic b/cancer, spine hips pelvis (more scans on 10.01.08) soon. I am computer illiterate,cant believe I got this far, I have been on Tamoxifen and take gabapentine for pain & morphine when I need to. Married with a husband I dont deserve sometimes, 2 sons,22 & 20 who dont deserve us sometimes, Im 52 just pottering along. I've been too scared to talk to others with this hideous disease, because Im well (looking ie "cant believe shes sick) comment. Have refused to go to help classes so far even though I have been to hell and back mentally, this is doing my head in more than the physical pain thats why im here. love to talk to someone lots more to say and to ask. thankyou Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: still here kalua LoriFL
